insertPrompt.name: insertPrompt
insertPrompt.summary: Inserts a new prompt into the database.

doc.description: Inserts a new prompt into the database.
doc.return: The ID of the inserted prompt if successful, otherwise null.

insertPrompt.comments:
/**
   * Inserts a new prompt into the database.
   *
   * @param string $title The title of the prompt.
   * @param string $content The content of the prompt.
   * @param string $lang The language of the prompt.
   * @param string $input The input of the prompt.
   * @param string $output The output of the prompt.
   * @param string|null $shortcode The shortcode of the prompt (optional).
   * @return mixed The ID of the inserted prompt if successful, otherwise null.
   */

params.description: Maximum number of rows to return.

params.name: $start
params.description: Offset of the first row to return.

dbTraitSelection.comments:
/**
   * Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.
   *
   * @param array $filter Filter conditions.
   * @param array $order Order by conditions.
   * @param int $limit Maximum number of rows to return.
   * @param int $start Offset of the first row to return.
   * @param string $mode The mode of result ('array', 'object', 'value').
   * @param array $fields Fields to select.
   *
   * @return array The result set.
   */

throws.description: If the table index is not defined or a field does not exist.

dbTraitGetRequestCfg.comments:

   * Prepares the request configuration for a database query.

   * @param array $filter Filter conditions.

   */
